effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. User charges for one turn before attacking. Critical hit chance is one level higher than normal. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. User charges for one turn before attacking. Critical hit chance is one level higher than normal. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

short_effect.black_white: User charges for one turn before attacking. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: User charges for one turn before attacking. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.black_white: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. It may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. It may also make the target flinch.
